var appName = "Soul"

var è¯æœ¯1 = rawInput("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç¬¬ä¸€å¥è¯", "â¤ï¸æ¬¢è¿åŠ å…¥æ³¡æ³¡åŒåŸå•èº«äº¤å‹å¤§å®¶åº­\nğŸ’›åŒ…è„±å•ï¼ŒåŒ…åˆ†é…ï¼ŒåŒ…å”®å\nğŸ’šçœ‹2éº¦ç®¡ç†ç¬é—´å°çŒªğŸ·å°çŒªå±è‚¡é‚£ä¸€ä¸²ç™½è‰²çš„æ‘©æ–¯å¯†ç ï¼Œå¤‡æ³¨soulåå­—ï¼Œæ‹‰ä½ è¿›å¤§å®¶åº­ï½\n\n\nä»Šæ™šå‘¨å…­æœ‰ä¸ªè½°è¶´èšä¼šï¼Œå¿ƒåŠ¨æ‹çˆ±å°æ¸¸æˆï¼Œç«é”…é…’æ°´ä¸€åº”ä¿±å…¨ï¼Œå°ç»„ç ´å†°å—¨èµ·æ¥ï¼Œç»å…¸çœŸå¿ƒè¯å¤§å†’é™©ï¼Œkæ­Œæ¡Œæ¸¸é€šé€šæ‹¿ä¸‹ã€‚åœºåœ°å«KTVã€å°çƒã€éº»å°†ï¼Œç„¶åæœ‰ç¤¾ç‰›ä¸»æŒäººå¸¦é˜Ÿï¼Œäº’ç›¸äº†è§£ï¼Œäº’ç›¸è®¤è¯†ã€‚ä¸€æ¬¡è®¤è¯†20â•åŒåŸå•èº«æœ‹å‹ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿åŠ å…¥ï½\n\n\næ³¨æ„ï¼šä¸è¦åªæ˜¯å…³æ³¨ç¾¤ä¸»ï¼Œå…³æ³¨æ˜¯æ²¡ç”¨çš„ï¼Œå…¬å±æœ‰æç¤º");

// toastLog(è¯æœ¯1)

function å¼€å§‹æ»šå±() {
    while (true) {
        // toastLog(è¯æœ¯1)

        launchApp(appName);
        sleep(3000)

        for (i =0; i < 3; i++) {
            if (id("tvChat").exists()) {
                id("tvChat").findOne(10000).click()
                setText(è¯æœ¯1)
            } else if (id("btnSend").exists()) {
                id("btnSend").findOne(10000).click()		
                back()                       
            } else if (id("etInputView").exists()) {
                setText(è¯æœ¯1)
            }
        }        
        sleep(57000)
    }
}

"rhino";
let LOGFLOAT = false;
/**
 * æ—¥å¿—æ‚¬æµ®çª—æŒ‰é’®ç»„ä»¶
 * @param {Number} x åæ ‡x
 * @param {Number} y åæ ‡y
 * @param {Function} executeMethod éœ€è¦æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ–¹æ³•
 */
function æ—¥å¿—æ˜¾ç¤º(x, y, executeMethod) {
  if (LOGFLOAT) {
    return toastLog('å·²å¯åŠ¨æ‚¬æµ®çª—');
  }
  LOGFLOAT = true;
  if (typeof x != 'number') x = 0;
  if (typeof y != 'number') y = 10;
  let floatyLogW = floaty.rawWindow(
    <card id="main" h="150" cardBackgroundColor="#b3000000" cardCornerRadius="8dp" cardElevation="1dp" gravity="center_vertical">
      <vertical paddingLeft="5" paddingRight="5" w="*">
        <horizontal margin="15 5 15 0">
          <horizontal h="auto" w="0" layout_weight="1">
            <text id="title" text="" textSize="13dp" textColor="#FFD700" textStyle="bold" style="Widget/AppCompat.Button.Borderless" />
            <text id="label" text="" textSize="13dp" textColor="#1E90FF" textStyle="bold" style="Widget/AppCompat.Button.Borderless" marginLeft="10" />
          </horizontal>
          <Chronometer id="runTime" textSize="13dp" textColor="#03D96A" w="auto" style="Widget/AppCompat.Button.Borderless" textStyle="bold" />
        </horizontal>
        <button gravity="center_horizontal" textColor="#DC143C" w="*" h="13" textStyle="bold" />
        <console id="console" w="*" h="*" padding="5" />
      </vertical>
    </card>
  );

  let controller = floaty.rawWindow(
    <vertical h="150" id="main">
      <text layout_weight="5" id="start" textStyle="bold" gravity="center" w="22dp" text="å¯åŠ¨" bg="#00a86b" />
      <text layout_weight="5" id="hide" textStyle="bold" gravity="center" w="22dp" text="æ—¥å¿—" bg="#FF8E12" />
      <text layout_weight="5" id="stop" textStyle="bold" gravity="center" w="22dp" text="ç»“æŸ" bg="#ee4d2d" />
    </vertical>
  );
  let hideButton = controller.hide;
  let startButton = controller.start;
  let stopButton = controller.stop;
  let runTimeView = floatyLogW.runTime;
  let floatConsole = floatyLogW.console;

  let _thread = null;

  setFloatyTitle = function (title) {
    ui.run(() => {
      floatyLogW.title.setText(title);
    });
  };
  setFloatyLabel = function (label) {
    ui.run(() => {""
      floatyLogW.label.setText(label);
    });
  };
  setFloatyOnStatus = function (enabled) {
    $ui.post(() => {
      if (floatyLogW && controller && runTimeView && startButton) {
        if (enabled) {
          // å¼€
          runTimeView.setBase(android.os.SystemClock.elapsedRealtime());
          runTimeView.start();
          startButton.setText('åœæ­¢');
          startButton.attr('background', '#05a7f4');
        } else {
          runTimeView.stop();
          startButton.setText('å¯åŠ¨');
          startButton.attr('background', '#00a86b');
        }
      }
    });
  };
  function dateFormat(date, fmt_str) {
    return java.text.SimpleDateFormat(fmt_str).format(new Date(date || new Date()));
  }

  ui.run(() => {
    runTimeView.setFormat('[è¿è¡Œæ—¶é•¿ %s ]');
    runTimeView.setBase(android.os.SystemClock.elapsedRealtime());

    floatConsole.setConsole(runtime.console); // è®¾ç½®æ§åˆ¶å°
    floatConsole.setInputEnabled(false); // æ§åˆ¶å°è¾“å…¥æ¡†ç¦ç”¨
    floatConsole.setColor('V', '#ffff00');
    floatConsole.setColor('I', '#ffffff');
    floatConsole.setColor('D', '#ffff00');
    floatConsole.setColor('W', '#673ab7');
    floatConsole.setColor('E', '#ff0000');
    floatConsole.setTextSize(13);

    floatyLogW.setTouchable(false);
    floatyLogW.setSize(-1, -2);
    floatyLogW.setPosition(3000, 3000);
    controller.setPosition(0, y);
  });
  controller.stop.click(() => {
    $app.launchPackage(context.getPackageName()); // è¿”å›è„šæœ¬åº”ç”¨ç•Œé¢
    toast('åœæ­¢æœ¬æ¬¡ä»»åŠ¡');
    // exit()
    if (_thread) {
      _isStop = true;
      _thread.interrupt();
    }
    $threads.shutDownAll();
    floatyLogW.close();
    controller.close();
    LOGFLOAT = false;
  });
  controller.hide.click(() => {
    hideButton.setEnabled(false);
    setTimeout(() => {
      hideButton.setEnabled(true);
    }, 3000);

    if (hideButton.text() == 'éšè—') {
      let animator = android.animation.ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(floatyLogW.main, 'translationX', 0, -1500);
      let mTimeInterpolator = new android.view.animation.DecelerateInterpolator();
      animator.setInterpolator(mTimeInterpolator);
      animator.setDuration(3000); //åŠ¨ç”»æ—¶é—´
      animator.start();
      setTimeout(() => {
        ui.post(() => {
          floatyLogW.setPosition(3000, 3000);
          hideButton.attr('text', 'æ—¥å¿—');
          hideButton.attr('background', '#FF8E12');
        });
      }, 2000);
    } else if (hideButton.text() == 'æ—¥å¿—') {
      setTimeout(() => {
        ui.post(() => {
          hideButton.setText('éšè—');
          hideButton.attr('background', '#d1c7b7');
          floatyLogW.setSize($device.width - 60, floatyLogW.getHeight());
          floatyLogW.setPosition(0 + 60, y);
        });
      }, 200);
      let animator = android.animation.ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(floatyLogW.main, 'translationX', -1500, 0);
      let mTimeInterpolator = new android.view.animation.DecelerateInterpolator(); // å¤´å¿«å°¾æ…¢
      animator.setInterpolator(mTimeInterpolator);
      animator.setDuration(3000); //åŠ¨ç”»æ—¶é—´
      animator.start();
    }
  });
  controller.start.click(() => {
    if (_thread ? !_thread.isAlive() : true) {
      //çº¿ç¨‹æ²¡æœ‰è¿è¡Œ
      if (controller) setFloatyOnStatus(true);
      _isStop = false;
      //æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œèµ‹å€¼ç»™å˜é‡_thread
      _thread = threads.start(function () {
        try {
          printLog('Task started');
          executeMethod();
          if (controller) setFloatyOnStatus(false);
          printLog('Task finished');
        } catch (e) {
          let info = $debug.getStackTrace(e);
          if (info.includes('com.stardust.autojs.runtime.exception.ScriptInterruptedException')) {
            printInfo(`Task Stop`);
          } else {
            printError('Task error:', e);
            printError('ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œå¤±è´¥' + info);
          }
          // _this.log("ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œå¤±è´¥>>æ‰“å¼€è½¯ä»¶å³ä¸Šè§’>>æŸ¥çœ‹æ—¥å¿—");
          setFloatyOnStatus(false);
        }
        //è¿è¡Œå®Œæ¯•ä¿®æ”¹æŒ‰é’®æ–‡å­—
        setFloatyOnStatus(false);
      });
    } else {
      setFloatyOnStatus(false);
      //çº¿ç¨‹æ­£åœ¨è¿è¡Œ
      _isStop = true;
      _thread && _thread.interrupt();
      //ä¸­æ–­çº¿ç¨‹;
    }
  });
  printInfo = function (msg) {
    console.info('[' + dateFormat(new Date(), 'HH:mm:ss') + '] ' + msg);
  };
  printLog = function (msg) {
    console.log('[' + dateFormat(new Date(), 'HH:mm:ss') + '] ' + msg);
  };
  printError = function (msg) {
    console.error('[' + dateFormat(new Date(), 'HH:mm:ss') + '] ' + msg);
  };
}

        sleep(3000)

        sleep(57000)

# coding: utf-8
#
import os
import uiautomator2 as u2
import keyboard
import time

connect=os.system('adb devices | grep -w "device" | awk \'NR==1{print $1}\'')
d = u2.connect(connect)

while True:
    time.sleep(1);
    d(resourceId="cn.soulapp.android:id/tvChat").click()
    time.sleep(1);
    d.send_keys("â¤ï¸åŠ å…¥æˆ‘ä»¬å•èº«ç¤¾äº¤äº¤å‹å¤§å®¶åº­\nğŸ’›åŒ…è„±å•ï¼ŒåŒ…åˆ†é…ï¼ŒåŒ…å”®åï¼ŒåŒ…æ‰“å‡\nğŸ’šçœ‹ç¾¤ä¸»ç¬é—´å°çŒªğŸ·çŒªè¹„ä¸‹è¾¹çš„æ°´æ§½é‚£ä¸€ä¸²é»‘é»‘çš„æ‘©æ–¯å¯†ç ï¼Œå¤‡æ³¨soulåå­—ï¼Œæ‹‰ä½ è¿›å¤§å®¶åº­ï½", clear=True)
    time.sleep(1);
    d(resourceId="cn.soulapp.android:id/btnSend").click()
    d.click(0.402,0.745)
    time.sleep(60);

# coding: utf-8
#
import os
import sys
import time
import subprocess
import keyboard
import uiautomator2 as u2

def get_device_id():
    # è·å–ç¬¬ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå·²è¿æ¥çš„Androidè®¾å¤‡ID
    try:
        result = subprocess.check_output(['adb', 'devices']).decode('utf-8')
        devices = [line.split('\t')[0]
            for line in result.splitlines()
            if '\tdevice' in line]
        return devices[0] if devices else None
    except (subprocess.CalledProcessError, IndexError):
        return None

def main():
    running = True
    
    # print(len(sys.argv))
    if len(sys.argv) > 1:        
        device_id = sys.argv[1]
        if not device_id:
            print("Error: No connect Android device found")
            sys.exit(1)

    else:
        device_id = get_device_id()
        if not device_id:
            print("Error: No connect Android device found")
            sys.exit(1)

    print(f"Connected device: {device_id}")

    # åˆå§‹åŒ–uiautomator2è¿æ¥
    try:
        d = u2.connect(device_id)
        print("Device connected successfully")

        while running:
            d(resourceId="cn.soulapp.android:id/tvChat").click()
            time.sleep(1);        
            # d.send_keys("â¤ï¸åŠ å…¥æˆ‘ä»¬å•èº«ç¤¾äº¤äº¤å‹å¤§å®¶åº­\nğŸ’›åŒ…è„±å•ï¼ŒåŒ…åˆ†é…ï¼ŒåŒ…å”®åï¼ŒåŒ…æ‰“å‡\nğŸ’šçœ‹ç¾¤ä¸»å¼•åŠ›ç­¾ï¼Œå¤‡æ³¨soulåå­—ï¼Œæ‹‰ä½ è¿›å¤§å®¶åº­ï½\n\n\næˆ‘ä»¬è¿™ä¸ªèšä¼šï¼Œæ˜¯åŒ…å«åƒç«é”…ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å–é…’ï¼Œé‡Œè¾¹æœ‰KTVã€å°çƒã€éº»å°†ï¼Œç„¶åæœ‰ç¤¾ç‰›ä¸»æŒäººå¸¦ç€å¤§å®¶åšå¾ˆå¤šä¸ªç ´å†°å°æ¸¸æˆï¼Œäº’ç›¸äº†è§£ï¼Œäº’ç›¸è®¤è¯†ã€‚å°±æ˜¯ä½ èƒ½å¤Ÿè®¤è¯†å¾ˆå¤šçš„æœ‹å‹å’Œå¼‚æ€§ï¼Œç„¶åè¿æ°”å¥½çš„è¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è„±å•å„¿ã€‚", clear=True)
            d.send_keys("â¤ï¸æ¬¢è¿åŠ å…¥æ³¡æ³¡åŒåŸå•èº«äº¤å‹å¤§å®¶åº­\nğŸ’›åŒ…è„±å•ï¼ŒåŒ…åˆ†é…ï¼ŒåŒ…å”®å\nğŸ’šçœ‹ç®¡ç†ç¬é—´å°çŒªğŸ·çŒªå±è‚¡é‚£ä¸€ä¸²ç™½è‰²çš„æ‘©æ–¯å¯†ç ï¼Œå¤‡æ³¨soulåå­—ï¼Œæ‹‰ä½ è¿›å¤§å®¶åº­ï½\n\n\nä»Šæ™šå‘¨å…­æœ‰ä¸ªè½°è¶´èšä¼šï¼Œå¿ƒåŠ¨æ‹çˆ±å°æ¸¸æˆï¼Œç«é”…é…’æ°´ä¸€åº”ä¿±å…¨ï¼Œå°ç»„ç ´å†°å—¨èµ·æ¥ï¼Œç»å…¸çœŸå¿ƒè¯å¤§å†’é™©ï¼Œkæ­Œæ¡Œæ¸¸é€šé€šæ‹¿ä¸‹ã€‚åœºåœ°å«KTVã€å°çƒã€éº»å°†ï¼Œç„¶åæœ‰ç¤¾ç‰›ä¸»æŒäººå¸¦é˜Ÿï¼Œäº’ç›¸äº†è§£ï¼Œäº’ç›¸è®¤è¯†ã€‚ä¸€æ¬¡è®¤è¯†20â•åŒåŸå•èº«æœ‹å‹ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿åŠ å…¥ï½\n\n\næ³¨æ„ï¼šä¸è¦åªæ˜¯å…³æ³¨ç¾¤ä¸»ï¼Œå…³æ³¨æ˜¯æ²¡ç”¨çš„ï¼Œå…¬å±æœ‰æç¤º", clear=True)
            # d.send_keys("test", clear=True)
            time.sleep(1);
            d(resourceId="cn.soulapp.android:id/btnSend").click()
            time.sleep(1);
            d.click(0.402,0.745)
            time.sleep(57);

    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Connected failed: {str(e)}")
        sys.exit(1)



if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
